awd_titl_txt: Symposium on the Interactions of the Auditory and Mauthner  Cell Systems; August 9-14, 1992; Montreal, Quebec, Canada
awd_abstract_narration: A conference entitled "Symposium on Interactions of the Auditory and            Mauthner Cell Systems" held in Montreal, Canada in  August, l992 is             sponsored in conjunction with the annual meeting of the                         International Society of Neuroethology.  This conference brings                 together, for the first time, an internationally recognized group of            neuroscientists who work on the neurobiology of Mauthner neurons                which trigger the acoustic escape reflex in fish and experts on the             auditory system. The conference enhances understanding of how these             two major systems interact and control sensorimotor coordination by             the brainstem.                                                                                                                                                  Proceedings of the conference will be published as a special issue              of the major scientific journal, BRAIN BEHAVIOR AND EVOLUTION.
